title: E DanunnADO
sahitya:
EDanunnADO bhadrAdri vAsuDEDanunnADO





caraNam 1



 EDanunnADO jADa toliyarAdu nADu gajEndrunikIDu bApina svAmi

   



caraNam 2



 drauNi bANajvAla dAkina bAluniki prANmiccina jagatrANa rakSakuDu

   



caraNam 3



 pAncAli sabhalOna bhangamondina nADu vanjana lEkanu valuvaccina taNDri

   



caraNam 4



 durvAsu DugramutO dharmasutuni jUDa nirvahincina navanIta cOrakuDu

   



caraNam 5



 akSayamuga shrI bhadrAcalamanduna sAkSAt-karincina jagadEka vIruDu
